overview: A Silicon Valley based digital communicator and divergent thinker who champions disruptive and viral technologies (with a sprinkle of coding thrown in for good measure.) Author of the “Wiki of Strategy: a guide to social media”, Blogger, CEO at Loquar Digital. After receiving an MA from the University of Nottingham, I was sponsored to train at Technology Ventures Corp in NM, USA which took me to the the National Labs at Los Alamos to develop social media networks and communities in 2007-8. In 2010, I moved to Silicon Valley to participate in the digital disruption helping start-ups reach fever pitch (achievement of 3.6 million views in 36 hours)and have recently completed the Thinking Design course at Stanford University 2012. In 2011, I was featured in asmallworld magazine in the article Life at the Top: ASW’s Most Connected Men.
